data.message: Why don't you allow open comments ... so we have to come to these posts and comment??? What is the issue lately with not being able to get to the pages/groups I admin on??? You are making sharing harder ... not easier. One minute I can click and mange the page and the next I just get flashing lines where my pages should be listed. Before, you made more changes and completely messed up all of my Notes. Then I had a problem with not being able to download my own photo posts ... you are ripe for a new social network to start rising ...
